meanings.sent1: After seeing the scary movie, she felt herself swounding.

meanings.definition: An exclamation of surprise or shock.
meanings.sent1: Swounding! I can't believe you did that!
meanings.sent3: Swounding, you scared me with that prank!
meanings.sent4: The magician's trick left the audience swounding in amazement.
meanings.sent5: Swounding! The sudden appearance of the clown startled everyone at the party.
